mapper.insert: insert into job (job_name, job_cycle_type, job_description, job_link, job_status, old_filename, filepath, cycle_setting, reread_time, create_time) values (#{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobCycleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cycleSetting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rereadTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
